doc.title: Halle II
doc.plot: The one time Reithoffer factories reveal themselves as a huge building complex, an industrial monument, four empty floors - an object per se. A "single frame tour" and the photographs of the individual floors are woven into another through multiple exposure, so that the individual parts of the building - inner and outer spaces - can be experienced simultaneously and a more complex viewpoint is created which nullifies the normal rules of perspective. (Thomas Steiner)
